name: Berry's Plan of Manchester (1750)
description: Plan of Manchester by John Berry, showing the town centre in the mid-18th century. Georeferenced via AllMaps and proven working as Cesium imagery layer in manchester-gis project.
notes:
From manchester-gis project (proven working in Cesium).
AllMaps mapId: 811b04a06391adb1
Credit: 1750 Berry - University of Manchester via Allmaps
Same IIIF image as source 9 (Casson & Berry c.1741-57) — same 1746 edition scan, different AllMaps georef.

See source 9 for comprehensive research notes including:
- LUNA IIIF (full-res 6500x4063px): https://luna.manchester.ac.uk/luna/servlet/iiif/maps002~1~1~415398~232468/info.json
- BL 1751 edition (8853x5084px): K.Top.18.78.2.TAB
- Manchester Archives+ Flickr panel photos of 1750 Berry edition
- Chetham's Library holds all 5 editions (1741-1757)
- Digital Archives CD with 4 of 5 editions (£20)
